parameters.name: MoveToFeat
parameters.description: Folder to which to move feature

parameters.name: MoveFromFeat
parameters.description: Folder from which to move feature

parameters.name: IsFolder
parameters.description: True if feature is a folder, false if a feature

title: IFeatureManager.MoveToFolder
description: Moves the selected feature or folder in the Solid Bodies Feature Manager design tree structure to the specified folder in the Solid Bodies Feature Manager design tree structure.
signature:
System.Boolean MoveToFolder( 
   System.String
MoveToFeat
,
   System.String
MoveFromFeat
,
   System.Boolean
IsFolder
)

parameters.name: MoveToFeat
parameters.description: Folder to which to move feature

parameters.name: MoveFromFeat
parameters.description: Folder from which to move feature

parameters.name: IsFolder
parameters.description: True if feature is a folder, false if a feature

returns: True if feature is moved, false if not
remarks:
This method is specific to the
Solid Bodies
folder only; it does not work for components.
